A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie should have been titled \"A Progressive Space Opera for millennials\". It was certainly marketed as a Starwars film. A simple chase scene of attrition. Familiar beloved characters were eliminated. A nonsense subplot with hints of social awareness towards greed and injustice\, casino scene anyone? It made no sense in this movie and it was \"forced\" in. Spare me the liberal hypocrisy while you dine in your red carpets and devour on caviar Hollywood! I don't believe the hype.  Rogue One was a far better movie. The \"last real\" StarWars movie.
